alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Greeley; Sherman; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 01 at 3:31AM CST until December 02 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts over 60 mph possible. * WHERE...In Colorado, Yuma, Kit Carson and Cheyenne Counties. In Kansas, Cheyenne, Sherman, Wallace and Greeley Counties. * WHEN...From Friday morning through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property including Christmas decorations and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust and perhaps a wall of dust is possible reducing visibilities and making travel hazardous if not dangerous at times.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
